description: Health-conscious local officials hope the smell will stop people descending on Lund for a festival.
title: Swedish city to use chicken manure to deter crowds
title_page: Swedish city to use chicken manure to deter crowds - BBC News
maintext: Defending the decision to spread a ton of chicken manure in the park, he said: "We get the opportunity to fertilise the lawns, and at the same time it will stink and so it may not be so nice to sit and drink beer."
